basics.name: Mus'ab Ziad Moh'd Banat
basics.label: M.D., Research Assistant at The Hashemite University
basics.summary: M.D., Research Assistant at The Hashemite University. Wikipedia 5th most active Arab editor. I translate medical and scientific articles. Wikipedia education program team leader at the Hashemite University in Jordan and Wikipedia campus ambassador. chairperson of Digital Arabic Content Club. Board member at wikiproject med foundation.

skills.name: Internet
keywords: Wikipedia education program team leader at Hashemite University in Jordan.
Wikipedia education program team leader at Wikimedia Levant.
Member of the Wikimedia OTRS team.
Mass message sender on meta wiki.
Administrator on the Arabic Wikipedia, Wiktionary, Wikibooks and Wikisource. I am also bureaucrat and interface-admin on the Arabic Wikisource. - Wikipedia education program campus ambassador.
Wikipedia education program online ambassador.
Kiwix ambassador.
Was involved in creating of an offline medical Wikipedia app in Arabic (translated the interface).
Long-term mobile version editor through Wikipedia Zero project.
Member of Wikimedians of the Levant since April 2015.
Member of Wikipedia & Education User Group since April 2018. - Member of Wiki Project Med foundation since July 2017.
Board of Wiki Project Med foundation since March 2019.

Associate editor at WikiJournal of Medicine since December 2018. - File mover, autopatrolled and extended uploader on Wikimedia Commons. - Ranked as 8th Top medical editor in 2015 among global medical editors on  Wikipedia and I was ranked 40th in the Top medical editors list in 2016, 10th in  2017 and 16th in 2018. Also, in the beginning of my contribution on Wikipedia I  was ranked as 58th Top medical editor in 2014 as the highest Arabic medical editor  in all three consecutive years (2014-2015-2016) and the second highest Arabic  medical editor at 2017 and 2018.
Ranked 4th on List of Wikipedians by number of edits on Arabic Wikipedia  with more than 161,700 contributions/edits on Arabic Wikipedia (I am the 4th most  active editor in the Arab world) .
Created more than 1100 articles on Arabic Wikipedia.
Made over 9,200 edits on English Wikipedia and over 197,005 global  contributions in all Wikimedia projects.
Participated in the Proofreading of Arabic version of WMF machine translation  survey.
Won the Jordan Academy of Arabic award - first rank â€“ for internet-based  language initiatives at the level of the country.
